languages.text: {n}Маражай растягивает бледные губы в улыбке.{/n} "Хотел бы я взглянуть, как ты попытаешься это сделать... но нет, мон-кай. Я буду лишен такого развлечения".
{n}Marazhai's pale lips stretch into a smile.{/n} "I would love to see you do that... But no, mon-keigh. I will be denied such entertainment."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай растягивает бледные губы в улыбке.{/n} "Хотел бы я взглянуть, как ты попытаешься это сделать... но нет, мон-кай. Я буду лишен такого развлечения".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai stretches his pale lips in a smile.{/n} "I would love to see you do that... But no, mon-keigh. I will be deprived of such entertainment."

{n}Marazhai's pale lips stretch into a smile.{/n} "I would love to see you do that... But no, mon-keigh. I will be denied such entertainment."

languages.text: {n}Les lèvres pâles de Marazhai s'étirent en un sourire.{/n} « J'adorerais vous voir à l'œuvre... Mais hélas non, mon-keigh. Je n'aurai pas le loisir d'assister à un tel spectacle. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's pale lips stretch into a smile.{/n} "I would love to see you do that... But no, mon-keigh. I will be denied such entertainment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les lèvres pâles de Marazhai s'étirent dans un sourire.{/n} « J'adorerais vous voir à l'œuvre... Mais hélas non, mon-keigh. Je n'aurai pas le loisir d'assister à un tel spectacle. »

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋苍白的嘴角露出了微笑。{/n}“我倒是很乐意亲眼看看……不过，不行，猴子。要是我死了，那我就享受不到了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's pale lips stretch into a smile.{/n} "I would love to see you do that... But no, mon-keigh. I will be denied such entertainment."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋张开了苍白的嘴唇，露出了微笑。{/n}“我倒是很乐意亲眼看看……不过，不行，猴子。要是我死了，那我就享受不到了。”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは青白い唇を伸ばして微笑んだ。{/n}「お前がそうするのを見てみたいものだが…それはかなわんぞ、モン＝ケイ。それではせっかくの楽しみが奪われる」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's pale lips stretch into a smile.{/n} "I would love to see you do that... But no, mon-keigh. I will be denied such entertainment."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは青白い唇を伸ばして微笑んだ。{/n}「お前がそうするのを見てみたいものだが…それはかなわんぞ、モン＝ケイ。それではせっかくの楽しみが奪われる」

languages.text: {n}Marazhais fahle Lippen verzerren sich zu einem Grinsen.{/n} "Das würde ich wirklich gerne erleben ... Aber nein, Chem-Pan-Sey. Ich werde mir dieses Vergnügen vorenthalten müssen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's pale lips stretch into a smile.{/n} "I would love to see you do that... But no, mon-keigh. I will be denied such entertainment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai verzieht seine blassen Lippen zu einem Grinsen.{/n} "Das würde ich wirklich gerne erleben ... Aber nein, Chem-Pan-Sey. Ich werde mir dieses Vergnügen vorenthalten müssen."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai estira sus pálidos labios hasta formar una sonrisa.{/n} «Me encantaría ver cómo lo haces... pero no, mon-keigh. Me temo que me ha sido denegado semejante espectáculo».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's pale lips stretch into a smile.{/n} "I would love to see you do that... But no, mon-keigh. I will be denied such entertainment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai estira sus pálidos labios hasta formar una sonrisa.{/n} «Me encantaría ver cómo lo haces... pero no, mon-keigh. Me temo que me voy a privar de semejante espectáculo».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın solgun dudaklarında bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Bunu yapışını izlemeyi çok isterdim ama hayır mon-keigh. Maalesef bu eğlenceden mahrum kalacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's pale lips stretch into a smile.{/n} "I would love to see you do that... But no, mon-keigh. I will be denied such entertainment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın solgun dudaklarında bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Bunu yapışını izlemeyi çok isterdim ama hayır mon-keigh. Maalesef bu eğlenceden mahrum kalacağım."
